Ability.Description: Increases critical hit chance while dual wielding.

Rank.Description: After successfully hitting with Swift Strike, Setting Moon or Thread the Trees you gain an additional 3% chance to critically hit with Follow Up attacks for 6 seconds.
After successfully hitting with Swift Strike, Setting Moon or Thread the Trees you gain an additional 6% chance to critically hit with Follow Up attacks for 6 seconds.
After successfully hitting with Swift Strike, Setting Moon or Thread the Trees you gain an additional 9% chance to critically hit with Follow Up attacks for 6 seconds.
Physical attacks ignore 2% of the target's armor.
Physical attacks ignore 4% of the target's armor.
Physical attacks ignore 6% of the target's armor.
Physical attacks ignore 8% of the target's armor.
Physical attacks ignore 10% of the target's armor.
Increases Damage of attacks that generate Attack Points by 2%.
Increases Damage of attacks that generate Attack Points by 4%.
Increases Damage of attacks that generate Attack Points by 6%.
Increases Damage of attacks that generate Attack Points by 8%.
Increases Damage of attacks that generate Attack Points by 10%.
Unlocks the Wrist Strike ability.
Hitting with a single target Follow Up Attack grants a second strike that does 1 Physical Damage for every 12 Attack Power.
Hitting with a single target Follow Up Attack grants a second strike that does 1 Physical Damage for every 8 Attack Power.
Hitting with a single target Follow Up Attack grants a second strike that does 1 Physical Damage for every 4 Attack Power.
You gain a 50% chance of generating a second Attack Point when using a Follow Up attack.
You gain a 100% chance of generating a second Attack Point when using a Follow Up attack.
Hitting with an ability attack grants a 15% chance to increase Critical hit chance by 15% for 15 seconds.
Hitting with an ability attack grants a 30% chance to increase Critical hit chance by 15% for 15 seconds.
Hitting with an ability attack grants a 45% chance to increase Critical hit chance by 15% for 15 seconds.
Increases the duration on Fleet of Foot by 2 seconds and reduces its cooldown by 5 seconds. Increases movement speed by 2%.
Increases the duration on Fleet of Foot by 4 seconds and reduces its cooldown by 10 seconds. Increases movement speed by 4%.
Increases the duration on Fleet of Foot by 6 seconds and reduces its cooldown by 15 seconds. Increases movement speed by 6%.
Increases your chance to Dodge by 1%, your Attack Power by 2%, and Weapon Contribution by 2%.
Increases your chance to Dodge by 2%, your Attack Power by 4%, and Weapon Contribution by 4%.
Increases your chance to Dodge by 3%, your Attack Power by 6%, and Weapon Contribution by 6%.
Increases Critical Hit Damage by 2%.
Increases Critical Hit Damage by 4%.
Increases Critical Hit Damage by 6%.

Ability.Description: Instantly deals 2319 Physical damage that bypasses armor, snares the enemy and reduces their Strength and Dexterity by 80% for 8s. This ability grants 1 Attack Point.

Rank.Description: Unlocks the Death Touch ability.
When Flowing Strikes is triggered, damage is increased by 5%.
When Flowing Strikes is triggered, damage is increased by 10%.
Unlocks the Fleet of Foot ability.
Increase Strength by 2%.
Increase Strength by 4%.
Increase Strength by 6%.
Increase Strength by 8%.
Increase Strength by 10%.
Unlocks the Flinching Strike ability.
Increases Base Damage of Follow Up attacks by 5%.
Increases Base Damage of Follow Up attacks by 10%.
Increases Base Damage of Follow Up attacks by 15%.

Ability.Description: Absorbs 50% of damage taken up to 2757 damage. Lasts 30s. This Ability is not affected by the Global Cooldown.

Rank.Description: Unlocks the Shield of Will ability.

Ability.Description: Deals 2774 to 3066 damage. Debuffs the enemy, reducing ranged damage done to the Warrior by 20% for 15s. Awards 1 Attack Point.

Rank.Description: Unlock Tranquility ability.

Ability.Description: Increases the range of Swift Strike, Setting Moon, Reaping Harvest and all Follow Up attacks by 20m for 15s.
Successful Follow Up attacks place a stack of Readiness on the Warrior, up to 5 stacks. Each stack increases Attack Power and Weapon Contribution by 4%.

Rank.Description: Successful Follow Up attacks place a stack of Readiness on the Warrior, up to 5 stacks. Each stack increases Attack Power and Weapon Contribution by 4%.
Increases your Attack Power and Weapon Damage by 2%.
Increases your Attack Power and Weapon Damage by 4%.
Increases your Attack Power and Weapon Damage by 6%.
Increases your Attack Power and Weapon Damage by 8%.
Increases your Attack Power and Weapon Damage by 10%.
Increases the damage of Flurry and Reaping Harvest by 15%.
Increases the damage of Flurry and Reaping Harvest by 30%.
Swift Strike, Reaping Harvest, Setting Moon, and Flurry ignore 10% of enemy Armor. The damage and healing done by Turn the Blade are reduced by 25%.
Swift Strike, Reaping Harvest, Setting Moon, and Flurry ignore 20% of enemy Armor. The damage and healing done by Turn the Blade are reduced by 20%.
Increases the Base Damage of Swift Strike, Reaping Harvest, Setting Moon, and Flurry by 10%.
Increases the Base Damage of Swift Strike, Reaping Harvest, Setting Moon, and Flurry by 20%.
You may have 2 active Way buffs.

Ability.Description: Single target ability attacks hit up to 4 additional enemies. Reduces the damage of all attacks by 70%.

Rank.Description: Unlocks the Sweeping Blades ability.

AbilityRank.Description: Deals 2774 to 3066 damage. Debuffs the enemy, reducing ranged damage done to the Warrior by 20% for 15s. Awards 1 Attack Point.
Follow Up attacks heal the Paragon 20% of Attack Power. Maximum active Way buffs: 1. Lasts 1h.
Successful Follow Up attacks place a stack of Readiness on the Warrior, up to 5 stacks. Each stack increases Attack Power and Weapon Contribution by 4%.
Base Damage is increased by 1% for each Point spent in the Paragon Soul.
Absorbs 50% of damage taken up to 2757 damage. Lasts 30s. This Ability is not affected by the Global Cooldown.
Single target ability attacks hit up to 4 additional enemies. Reduces the damage of all attacks by 70%.
Increases the range of Swift Strike, Setting Moon, Reaping Harvest and all Follow Up attacks by 20m for 15s.
For the next 10s, Rising Waterfall, Final Blessing and Reaping Harvest hit twice.
Instantly adds 3 Attack Points to the Warrior. Increases the damage of the next Reaping Harvest by 50%.
Follow Up Attack. Deals 1248 to 1380 Physical damage, in addition to 3662 Physical damage over the next 15s. This ability grants 1 Attack Point.
Follow Up Attack. Deals 1747 to 1931 Physical damage to an enemy with under 30% health remaining. This ability grants 1 Attack Point.
Reduces the duration of the Global Cooldown by 0.5 seconds, and reduces the Power cost of abilities by 33%. Reduces damage and healing done by 30%.
Interrupts.

Charge an enemy, dealing 1172 to 1296 Physical damage to up to 5 enemies along the way. Roots the target enemy for 1.5 seconds. Removes all movement impairing effects from the Warrior. This ability grants 1 Attack Point.
Increases Physical Crit by 3%. Maximum active Way buffs: 1. Lasts 1h.
Follow Up Attack. Deals weapon plus 1565 to 1729 Physical damage. This ability grants 1 Attack Point.
The Warrior cannot be knocked back and takes 5% less damage. Maximum active Way buffs: 1. Lasts 1h.

Strike for weapon plus Physical damage:
1 Point: 1090 damage. 2 Points: 1644 damage. 3 Points: 2483 damage.

Follow each of the next 3 single target direct damaging attacks with a second strike:
1 Point: 10% of the damage of the initial attack. 2 Points: 20% of the damage of the initial attack. 3 Points: 30% of the damage of the initial attack.
For each point spent in Paragon beyond 28, the percentage of the initial attack per combo point used is increased by 0.36%.
Stuns for 4s.
Debilitates for 5s.
Increases the damage of all attacks by 25%.
Deal 1248 to 1380 Physical damage, in addition to increasing the damage of Follow Up attacks by 25% for 20s. This ability grants 1 Attack Point.
Increases movement speed by 50% for 15s.
Deals 1248 to 1380 plus weapon damage. Awards 1 Attack Point.
Instantly deals 2319 Physical damage that bypasses armor, snares the enemy and reduces their Strength and Dexterity by 80% for 8s. This ability grants 1 Attack Point.
Attack hits the target multiple times for 6558 Physical damage over the next 3 seconds. Awards 1 Attack Point every second.
Finishers gain a bonus to Attack Power contribution based on how many Attack Points were consumed.
Increases Strength by 70 on all party or raid members. Lasts 1h.
When hitting an enemy with a Follow Up attack or Reaping Harvest, deals an additional 379 Air damage. Maximum active Way buffs: 1. Lasts 1h.
Must be the next ability used within 10 seconds of using an ability that generates Attack Points and is not a follow up attack.
